title:u/pandapaxxy's Season Pass / Dawning controller breakdown
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazc2q/season_pass_dawning_weapons_controller_breakdown/

// Cold Front (curated)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / controller): "A new 750 RPM SMG with low stability."
dimwishlist:item=1506719573&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2387244414,1774574192

// Cold Front (PvE / controller)
